Content:: Hammel is a town in central Denmark with a population of 6,854 (1 January 2022),[1] and a former railway town at the Aarhus-Hammel-Thors√∏ railroad which was closed in 1956. The town is located in Favrskov municipality in Jutland. Until 1 January 2007 it was also the site of the municipal council of the now former Hammel Municipality.
